name: Neon Imp
description:
Retro synthwave , neon , top down shooter, perfect stylized graphic. What else do you need for a good computer game? Then I am glad to present you my creation! 15 stylized digital neon levels, retro synthwave and more. Simple plot of the game: Satan got viruses on his computer and our little but brave hero went to the digital neon world in order to cleanse him of viruses, bugs and glitches.

Contact with me: 13371337ddd@gmail.com

This game was created by 1 person.
